action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Lokasi Kebun Raya Balikpapan merupakan bagian kawasan yang berada di dalam kawasan Hutan Lindung Sungai Wain, dilatarbelakangi oleh keprihatinan akan semakin cepatnya kerusakan ekosistem hutan di Kalimantan Timur. Kerusakan tersebut akan berdampak pada hilangnya jenis-jenis tumbuhan khas Kalimantan. Selain itu, diharapkan adanya ruang terbuka hijau yang dapat mengakomodir kegiatan rekreasi, pendidikan, dan Konservasi masyarakat Balikpapan di sekitar Hutan Lindung Sungai Wain."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "The location of Balikpapan Botanical Garden is part of the area that is within the Hutan Lindung Sungai Wain, motivated by concerns about the rapid destruction of forest ecosystems in East Kalimantan. The damage will have an impact on the loss of typical Kalimantan plant species. In addition, it is expected that there is a green open space that can accommodate recreational activities, education, and conservation of balikpapan communities around the Hutan Lindung Sungai Wain."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Kantung semar merupakan tumbuhan karnivora yaitu tumbuhan pemakan daging seperti serangga dan hewan-hewan kecil. Di Indonesia setidaknya terdapat jenis kantong semar habitat terbanyak berada di Kalimantan dan Sumatera. Sayangnya, kekayaan jenis kantong tersebut masih kurang mendapat perhatian. Menurut data IUCN Red List, sedikitnya 27 spesies terancam punah."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Semar sacs are carnivorous plants, namely meat-eating plants such as insects and small animals. In Indonesia there are at least the most habitat pockets in Kalimantan and Sumatra. Unfortunately, the wealth of these types of pockets still receives less attention. According to the IUCN Red List, at least 27 species are threatened with extinction."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Beruang madu (Helarctos Malayanus) merupakan jenis paling kecil dari delapan jenis beruang yang ada di dunia. Beruang ini adalah maskot dari kota Balikpapan. Beruang madu di Balikpapan dikonservasi di sebuah hutan lindung bernama Hutan Lindung Sungai Wain."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "The honey bear (Helarctos Malayanus) is the smallest of the eight bears in the world. This bear is the mascot of the city of Balikpapan. The honey bear in Balikpapan is conserved in a protected forest called the Wain River Protected Forest."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Kabupaten Barito Kuala terletak paling barat dari Provinsi Kalimantan Selatan. Hampir semua kecamatan di Kabupaten Barito Kuala merupakan sentra produksi padi sawah. Produksi tanaman bahan makanan lainnya yaitu jagung, kedelai, kacang tanah, ubi kayu, dan ubi jalar. Wilayah hutan di Kabupaten ini tersebar diseluruh wilayah kecamatan, sebagian hutan ini merupakan kawasan lindung dengan fungsi khusus yaitu sebagai cagar alam, hutan wisata, hutan pantai berbakau dan hutan sempadan sungai."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Barito Kuala regency is located in the westernmost part of South Kalimantan Province. Almost all sub-districts in Barito Kuala Regency are centers of rice production. The production of other food crops is corn, soybeans, peanuts, yams, and sweet potatoes. The forest area in this regency is spread throughout the subdistrict, some of this forest is a protected area with special functions, namely as a nature reserve, tourist forest, filial beach forest and river border forest."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Pulau Kembang ini tidak dihuni manusia, namun didominasi oleh fauna seperti Kera Ekor Panjang yang menarik dari pulau ini adalah di dalam kawasan hutan wisata ini juga terdapat sebuah altar berlambangkan dua buah arca berwujud kera berwarna putih (hanoman), yang diperuntukkan sebagai tempat untuk meletakkan sesaji bagi para ‘penjaga’ pulau Kembang."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Kembang Island is not inhabited by humans, but is dominated by fauna such as long-tailed macaques that attract from this island is in this tourist forest area there is also an altar with two statues of white apes (hanoman), which is intended as a place to put offerings for the 'guardians' of Kembang island."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Kotawaringin terletak di sekitar aliran sungai kumai, dan lamandau, berawa-rawa dan merupakan daerah endapan bersifat organik dan asam. sektor‐sektor ekonomi yang terdapat di Kabupaten Kotawaringin antara lain pertanian seperti padi‐padian, jagung, jenis ubi‐ubian, jenis kacang‐ kacangan, sayuran dan buah‐buahan,perkebunan seperti karet, kelapa, kopi, cengkeh, pertambangan, industri, perdagangan dan pariwisata."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Kotawaringin is located around the kumai river stream, and lamandau, swampy and is an area of organic and acidic sediments. economic sectors in Kotawaringin Regency include agriculture such as rice, corn, sweet potato type, types of beans, vegetables and fruits, plantations such as rubber, coconut, coffee, cloves, mining, industry, trade and tourism."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Terletak di semenanjung barat daya provinsi Kalimantan Tengah memiliki luas 415 hektar. Tanjung puting terdiri atas ragam variasi ekosistem dari berbagai jenis flora seperti pemakan serangga seperti kantong semar, keruing, meranti, ramin, gaharu, ulin, jelutung serta lain-lainya. Selain itu, kamu juga bisa menemukan satwa eksotis langka seperti orangutan, buaya, bekantan, beruang madu, rusa sambar, duyung dan lainnya."

action.name: Set at XY
action.param: "Located on the southwestern peninsula of Central Kalimantan province has an area of 415 hectares. Tanjung nipple consists of a variety of ecosystem variations from various types of flora such as insectivores such as semar bags, keruing, meranti, ramin, agarwood, ulin, jelutung and others. In addition, you can also find rare exotic animals such as orangutans, crocodiles, bekantan, honey bears, sambar deer, mermaids and others."
